definition[0]: a system in which a student can work for a company in order to learn about a job, or the period during which a student does this
example[0]: Ella is about to do work experience with a clothing manufacturer.
definition[1]: the experience you have had of working in a particular type of job
example[2]: She’s well qualified but has no relevant work experience.
definition[2]: a period of time that a young person spends working in a particular place, as a form of training
example[3]: Why do I have to do work experience?
example[4]: The teenagers spend two weeks on work experience in local businesses.
definition[3]: a short period of time during which a young person works for a company in order to learn about a job and about working life in general
example[5]: Shell is working on projects to help find training and work experience for some of Brazil’s 13 million street children.
